list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move one's hand to and fro in greeting or as a signal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he waved to me from the train
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh vẫy tay với tôi từ tàu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move to and fro with a swaying or undulating motion while remaining fixed to one point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the flag waved in the wind

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: style (hair) so that it curls slightly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her hair had been carefully waved for the evening
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tóc cô đã được vẫy cẩn thận vào buổi tối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long body of water curling into an arched form and breaking on the shore.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was swept out to sea by a freak wave
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta bị cuốn xuống biển bởi một làn sóng kỳ dị

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden occurrence of or increase in a specified phenomenon, feeling, or emotion.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: horror came over me in waves
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kinh dị đến với tôi trong sóng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gesture or signal made by moving one's hand to and fro.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he gave a little wave and walked off
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đưa một chút sóng và bước đi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a slightly curling lock of hair.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his hair was drying in unruly waves
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tóc anh ta đang khô trong sóng unululy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a periodic disturbance of the particles of a substance which may be propagated without net movement of the particles, such as in the passage of undulating motion, heat, or sound.
